posts.author: John D
posts.title: Confusion about Gradient Descent algorithm
posts.content: I'm having trouble understanding how the gradient descent algorithm works in practice. Can someone explain with a simple example?

replies.author: Sarah M
replies.content: Gradient descent is an optimization algorithm used to minimize functions by iteratively moving in the direction of steepest descent.

replies.author: Professor A
replies.content: Think of it like trying to find the lowest point in a valley by always walking downhill.
